input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product specifications and product title.

Product title:
6S2 6 Piece Tool Set w/Vinyl Clad

Product specifications:
3 Year Warranty
Fujiyama Brand
Made in Japan
30 Day Satisfaction Guarantee on all Fujiyama Bonsai Tools
Professional Bonsai Tools

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This product is a set of six bonsai tree pruning tools.  They are made in Japan and come with a 3 year warranty.  You can return them for a refund within 30 days if you are not happy with them.
input_text.Response B:
The 6S2 6 Piece Tool Set w/Vinyl Clad is a high quality, professional grade tool set made in Japan by Fujiyama. It comes with a 3 Year Warranty, 30 Day Satisfaction Guarantee, and is made from premium materials for durability and long life. Some of the main features of this tool set include:

-3 Year Warranty
-30 Day Satisfaction Guarantee
-Fujiyama Brand
-Made in Japan
-Professional Grade
-Vinyl Clad Finish for extra durability

This tool set includes 6 of the most commonly used bonsai tools, including:

-Wire Cutter (180mm)
-Large Leaf Trimmer (180mm)
-Medium Leaf Trimmer (160mm)
-Small Leaf Trimmer (140mm)
-Budding Knife (170mm)
-Root Razor (180mm)

These tools are designed for precise, professional use in bonsai gardening and are ideal for hobbyists and

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
